review: We're extremely pleased with the Fire Stick.
author: Susan MacKenzie

review: Pre-ordered this because of the Deal for prime members.  I had X-box units hooked up to all the tvs to stream.  I like the layout of this unit very much,  my daughter will only watch tv with the fire-stick now.  I am sorry I did not buy a couple at the intro price.
author: Detpete

review: Love it!  Easy to install.  Very user friendly.
author: Barbara Holzinger

review: very easy to use with great navigation. I am glad I bought it over its competitors.
author: J_T

review: I can't get enough of this Firestick.  Getting movies, Netflx, games Tv shows and more all in one device is awesome.
author: RI deal hunter69

review: EXCELLENT!!! Best thing we ever bought :)-easy to work no issues so far , we watch it daily
author: Kresha C.

review: Easy to use and have me the shows and programming I wanted.
author: Randy Lich
